item.title: Cebu Pacific has added Fukuoka to its list of destinations
item.description:
Cebu Pacific Air (CEB) initiated flights between Manila and Fukuoka on December 17th, adding a third weekly service to their existing routes in Japan. This marks their fourth destination in Japan, including direct flights from Manila to Osaka, Tokyo (Narita), and Nagoya, as well as flights from Cebu to Tokyo (Narita). Japan is a top destination for travelers from the Philippines. Data from the Japan National Tourism Organization indicates a 44% increase in Filipino arrivals, reaching over 211,000 between January and October 2015, compared to the same period the previous year...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/cebu-pacific-has-added-fukuoka-to-its-list-of-destinations/
